subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: When Boston Celtics point guard Rajon Rondo wrenched his left ankle early in the third quarter of Game 3 of the N.B.A. finals, it was possible he may have turned something else — the series.
snippet: When Boston Celtics point guard Rajon Rondo wrenched his left ankle early in the third quarter of Game 3 of the N.B.A. finals, it was possible he may have turned something else — the series.
